name: Preschool Training for Windows
description:
Windows

Download file and unzip, Double click the .exe file to launch.

 Use the left mouse button to select the door or cabinets.

Hold the left mouse button to select the items  and pick it up, release the mouse button to drop it.

"W" and "S" to walk forward and Backwards

"A" and "D" to go sideways

"Shift + "W" to run.
